name: FNServer Image Collaboration Software
short_description: FNServer is image collaboration software for web servers written for PHP4/5 implementing the FotoNotes(TM) image annotation specification. Modular and object-oriented, FNServer runs stand-alone or as a part of other CMS's. Offers blog and wiki features.
